summary: This module is intended to serve as a command‑line entry point for training and evaluating a CAREGNN graph neural network model that incorporates a sampling strategy. It imports argument parsing, DGL for graph handling, the CAREGNN model and sampler implementations, loss and metric utilities, and an early‑stopping helper.
business_intent: Enable users to run experiments that train a cancer‑response prediction GNN with configurable sampling, monitor performance using recall and AUC, and stop training when validation metrics cease improving.
